data.title: Multiple of 4
data.statement:
Leon is having trouble with his homework, he has [[N]] numbers, and he needs to determine each number is a multiple of {{4}} or not.

When he is deciding to ask for some help from you, something happens. His little sister Nita scribbles on his homework, and some digits will be covered and can't be seen (covered digits will be represented by {{X}}).

For example, the question is {{1482}}.
Nita scribbles {{4}} and {{2}}. Then it will become {{1X8X}}.

Can you still help him?
Output {{true}}/{{false}} if you can confirm that the number is divisible by {{4}} or not, or else output {{idk}}.

testCases.title: Validator 2

loop N read x:word(5)
loop N write true/false/idk

x: will contain character 'X'
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1:>> An integer [[N]]
<<Next [[N]] lines:>> An integer [[x]] that might contain character {{X}} that represents a covered digit
data.outputDescription:
for each number, output
{{true}} if you can confirm it is divisible by {{4}},
{{false}} if you can confirm it isn't divisible by {{4}},
{{idk}} if you cannot confirm.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

Leon is having trouble with his homework, he has N numbers, and he needs to determine each number is a multiple of 4 or not.

When he is deciding to ask for some help from you, something happens. His little sister Nita scribbles on his homework, and some digits will be covered and can't be seen (covered digits will be represented by X).

For example, the question is 1482.
Nita scribbles 4 and 2. Then it will become 1X8X.

Can you still help him?
Output true/false if you can confirm that the number is divisible by 4 or not, or else output idk.
Input
Line 1: An integer N
Next N lines: An integer x that might contain character X that represents a covered digit
Output
for each number, output
true if you can confirm it is divisible by 4,
false if you can confirm it isn't divisible by 4,
idk if you cannot confirm.
Constraints
0 < N < 10
0 < x < 100 000
Example
Input
2
232
399
Output
true
false
